Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Contributo concesso dalla Fondazione Banco di Sardegna per il progetto "Analisi teorica e quantitativa delle cause del cambiamento strutturale e degli effetti sugli aggregati macroeconomici, con particolare riferimento ai settori della manifattura e dei servizi" Importo finanziato: 6000 euro https://www.dropbox.com/s/5tme5gx0b5li4op/fondazione1.png?dl=0

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Relatore alle seguenti conferenze e seminari a invito: • 2016: Universitat de Barcelona; Université du Luxembourg; World Finance Conference, New York; London School of Economics; University of Cambridge (scheduled); V Workshop on Structural change and Macroeconomic Dynamics, University of Kent (scheduled); 41st Simposio de la Asociación Española de Economía, Bilbao (scheduled). • 2015: Carlos III; Society for Economic Dynamics, Warsaw; Workshop on Structural Transformation, St. Andrews; 56th meeting, SIE, University Parthenope, Naples; Conference on Urbanization, Structural Change, and Employment, Hong Kong. • 2014: Università di Sassari; V Workshop on Institutions, individual behavior and economic outcomes, Alghero; 3rd Workshop on Structural change and Macroeconomic Dynamics, PSE; Summer School in Economic Growth, Capri; 55th meeting, SIE, University of Trento; LACEA, São Paulo; XXXIX Simposio de la Asociación Española de Economía, Palma de Mallorca. • 2013: 21st CEPR ESSIM, Izmir; IV Workshop on Institutions, individual behavior and economic outcomes, Alghero; Reserve Bank of New Zealand; University of Queensland, Brisbane; University of New South Wales, Sydney; Monash University, Melbourne; University of Melbourne; Australian National University, Canberra; XXXVIII Simposio de la Asociación Española de Economía, Santander. • 2012: 61ème Congrès de l’Association Française de Sciences Economiques, Universitè Paris 2; Norges Bank; XXXVII Simposio de la Asociación Española de Economía, Universidad de Vigo. • 2011: Royal Economic Society, Royal Holloway; University of Surrey, Guilford; University of Milan (DEAS); 52nd meeting, SIE, University Rome 3; IV Conference on Economic Policy and the Business Cycle, University of Milan-Bicocca; Conference on Economic Development and Growth, XREAP, Universitat de Barcelona; XXXVI Simposio de la Asociación Española de Economía, Universidad de Malaga. • 2010: Northeast Universities Development Consortium (NEUDC), MIT; City University London; Royal Economic Society, University of Surrey; IGIER; 18th Society for Nonlinear Dynamics and Econometrics 18th Symposium, University of Piemonte Orientale, Novara; 51st meeting, SIE, University of Catania; XXXV Simposio de la Asociación Española de Economía, Universidad Autonoma de Madrid. • 2009: Spring Meeting of Young Economists, Istanbul; Uppsala University; EURISBIS; XIV Workshop on Dynamic Macroeconomics, Vigo; EEA-ESEM Meeting, UAB and UPF; 50th meeting, SIE, Bank of Italy and LUISS; Bank of Spain; XXXIV Simposio de la Asociación Española de Economía, University of Valencia. • 2008: 49th Meeting, SIE, University of Perugia; ASSET conference, European University Institute, Florence; XXXIII Simposio de la Asociación Española de Economía, University of Zaragoza. • 2007: XXXII Simposio de la Asociación Española de Economía, University of Granada.
Presenter: Northeast Universities Development Consortium (NEUDC), Massachussets Institute of Technology

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Research Fellow presso Banco de Espana (Spanish Central Bank) to develop the project "Development, Growth and Volatility", later published with the title "Structural Change, Growth and Volatility" in the American Economic Journal: Macroeconomics http://www.bde.es/f/we bbde/SES/Secciones/Publicaciones/Publica cionesSeriadas/DocumentosTrabajo/10/Fic/ dt1023e.pdf

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Principal investigator: Cambio Strutturale e Andamento Macroeconomico: Teoria ed Evidenza Empirica Progetto concluso. Ha partecipato al bando LEGGE REGIONALE 7 AGOSTO 2007, N.7 : "PROMOZIONE DELLA RICERCA SCIENTIFICA E DELL'INNOVAZIONE TECNOLOGICA IN SARDEGNA" ricevendo punteggio 86/100 (non finanziato). Referee Reports https://www.dropbox.com/s/ra76prv8illfx60/referee_report.pdf?dl=0

Principal Investigator: Macroeconomic Effects of Structural Transformation Il progetto è in corso di svolgimento. Ha inoltre partecipato al PRIN 2015 ricevendo un punteggio finale di 12/15 (non finanziato). Si allega la versione inviata al MIUR. I report dei referee possono essere scaricati al seguente link https://www.dropbox.com/sh/eev8l by1ai5b7sg/AAC0ozvziO5s1rt9rTmNKLsTa?dl= 0

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Pubblicazione della tesi di laurea sulla Rivista di Politica Economia come una delle 5 migliori tesi sottomesse alla rivista nel 2001 (pubblicata nel 2002). http://www.rivistapoliticaeconomica. it/2002/nov-dic/prefazione.pdf http:/ /www.rivistapoliticaeconomica.it/2002/no v-dic/moro.pdf
